name: WOOD You Like Your Item?
description:
Global Game Jam 2021 page
A game about managing a park's Lost & Found service. Give the randomly generated NPCs the items they want and try to reach a high score! Inspired by games like Papers Please.
How to play: Drag the correct item to the NPCs (not the text box!)

Team:
Art - Inácio Maio, Jenifer Lagoaça | Program: Aseprite
Programming - Carolina Costa, Tiago Videira
Sound Design - Tiago Videira
